statements: SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT participant_id, age, gender FROM SurveyResponses WHERE profession = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT participant_id, age, profession FROM SurveyResponses WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY profession ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY participant_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT profession, COUNT(*) FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY profession
SELECT age, gender, COUNT(*) FROM SurveyResponses WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor' GROUP BY age, gender HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT profession FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY profession
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_timestamp >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY response_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT response_id, age, gender FROM survey_responses WHERE age > 30;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE ethics_approval = TRUE;
SELECT response_id, age, gender, ethnicity FROM survey_responses WHERE completed = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT response_id, participant_id, age, gender FROM survey_responses WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE completed = TRUE AND gender='Female'
SELECT study_name, researcher_id, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE ethics_approval = TRUE ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT response_id, participant_id, age, ethnicity FROM survey_responses WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 50 AND ethnicity='Asian'
SELECT study_id, study_name, researcher_id FROM research_studies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM researchers
SELECT id, name, institution FROM researchers
SELECT name, specialty FROM researchers
SELECT id, name, ethnicity FROM participants
SELECT * FROM researchers_survey_responses
SELECT * FROM researchers_survey_responses WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, institution FROM researchers WHERE specialty = 'Psychology' ORDER BY institution DESC;
SELECT id, name, age, ethnicity FROM participants WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM researchers_survey_responses GROUP BY researcher_id HAVING total_responses > 5 ORDER BY total_responses DESC;

SELECT participant_id, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM researchers_survey_responses JOIN participants ON researchers_survey_responses.participant_id = participants.id GROUP BY participant_id HAVING avg_age > 25;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Surveys WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM Participants WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT response_text FROM Responses ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, researcher_name FROM Surveys JOIN Researchers ON Surveys.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM Participants WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT Responses.response_text, Participants.participant_name FROM Responses JOIN Participants ON Responses.participant_id = Participants.participant_id;
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(*) AS num_responses FROM Surveys JOIN Responses ON Surveys.survey_id = Responses.survey_id GROUP BY survey_name HAVING num_responses > 5 ORDER BY num_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM studies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, age, gender FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT question, answer FROM survey_responses ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM studies WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT study_id, question, answer FROM survey_responses WHERE answer LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY study_id DESC;
